EmailTemplate.subject: Are You Leveraging Container Platforms? Help Shape Our Roadmap and earn a $50 Amazon Gift Card!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
We’re seeing more and more organizations leverage Container Platforms as a result of increasing cloud native adoption and application mobility. Are you one of them? As we continue to enhance our platform for the next generation of applications and infrastructure, we want to better understand your challenges as you develop, deploy, and/or manage cloud native applications and container-based services.
Please take this quick survey for a chance to win $100 and be selected for a market research interview.
Click here to take survey <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/container-platforms]]> We’re offering $50 Amazon Gift cards for 30-minute interviews. Spots are limited! If you’ve been selected, we will reach out directly. Whether you’re leveraging Kubernetes, RedHat OpenShift, Mesos, Pivotal Cloud Foundry, or others your input will help guide our roadmap.
Thank you!
Asena Woodward Product Marketing
